Uses of Package
org.springframework.ui.velocity

Packages that use org.springframework.ui.velocity
org.springframework.ui.velocity Support classes for setting up Velocity within a Spring application context. 
org.springframework.web.servlet.view.velocity Support classes for the integration of Velocity as Spring web view technology.  
 

Classes in org.springframework.ui.velocity used by org.springframework.ui.velocity
VelocityEngineFactory
          Factory that configures a VelocityEngine.
 

Classes in org.springframework.ui.velocity used by org.springframework.web.servlet.view.velocity

          Factory that configures a VelocityEngine.
